name: Jewel Quest Seven Seas
summary: The famous jewel adventurers, Rupert and Emma are back… and unlike you have ever seen them before! After receiving a mysterious message from their old friend Hani, saying that the Jewel Boards were in danger, the duo must work fast to save both the jewel boards as well as Hani. But can they do both? Will they have to choose between the treasured Jewel Boards and their friend? And who is putting everyone in danger?
